meanings.definition: Not having a lot of money or possessions.
meanings.sent1: The unaffluent family lived in a small house.
meanings.sent2: She preferred to shop at thrift stores due to her unaffluent lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The unaffluent man tried to pay for his meal with a handful of coins.
meanings.sent4: Her unaffluent wardrobe consisted mostly of hand-me-downs.
meanings.sent5: The unaffluent neighborhood had simple, modest homes.

meanings.sent1: Despite their hard work, the unaffluent couple struggled to make ends meet.
meanings.sent2: The unaffluent community came together to support each other during tough times.
meanings.sent3: The unaffluent businessman always dreamed of striking it rich.
meanings.sent4: Her unaffluent background motivated her to strive for success.
meanings.sent5: The unaffluent student saved every penny to afford college tuition.
